name: react-native-generate-plugin
description: generates react native components directly from design
author: Hossam Abdelnaser

scripts.build: npm run compile && xdpm package dist
scripts.debug:install: webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development && xdpm install dist -o
scripts.debug:watch: xdpm watch dist | webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development --watch
scripts.debug:watch-prerelease: xdpm watch dist -w p | webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development --watch
